alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 14 at 12:05PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Conditions will gradually improve today, however northwest winds gusting up to 50 mph will create areas of blowing snow this afternoon. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Snow blowing across the roads could create small drifts and slippery spots. Snow drifts on the road could cause you to lose control of your vehicle.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
